Introduction

Cats, also known as The Reds 2nd, was a girl group under Rose Entertainment.

The group was supposed to act as a second generation to the girl group The Red. Auditions were held at Samsung Coex Mall in January 2007, rounding up 4 members to be in the lineup of the group. They made their official stage debut on January 27, 2007, on MBC Music Core, before releasing their first, and only self-titled full-length album on February 8, 2007.

It is assumed they silently disbanded since the release of their debut album.
